overview: Mark is the VP, Product Strategy at Revstream, Inc. He joined at its infancy and is responsible for Revstream’s product architecture, strategy and implementation. Mark brings over 14 years of experience in professional consulting and senior IT management across diverse industries including high tech, online media, interactive entertainment and telecommunications. Prior to joining Revstream, Mark was the Director of Business Applications at Vivendi Games, (now Activision Blizzard), where he led the strategic planning, deployment and support of global enterprise applications. Additionally, Mark has over 8 years in management consulting with KPMG Consulting, Aquarius Consulting Group, and Arthur Andersen Business Consulting where he specialized in global ERP implementation, business process reengineering, and finance and supply chain strategic initiatives. Mark received his BBA in Management Information Systems from the University of Texas at Austin.
